verses.verse: The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the solitary place <S%H6723><s%> shall be glad <S%H7797><s%> for them; and the desert <S%H6160><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%>, and blossom <S%H6524><s%> as the rose <S%H2261><s%>.

It shall blossom <S%H6524><s%> abundantly <S%H6524><s%>, and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> even with joy <S%H1525><s%> and singing <S%H7444><s%>: the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto it, the excellency <S%H1926><s%> of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> and Sharon <S%H8289><s%>, they shall see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and the excellency <S%H1926><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.
Strengthen <S%H2388><s%> ye the weak <S%H7504><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>, and confirm <S%H553><s%> the feeble <S%H3782><s%> knees <S%H1290><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> to them that are of a fearful <S%H4116><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, Be strong <S%H2388><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> not: behold, your God <S%H430><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> with vengeance <S%H5359><s%>, even God <S%H430><s%> with a recompence <S%H1576><s%>; he will come <S%H935><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> you. fearful: Heb. hasty
Then the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> shall be opened <S%H6491><s%>, and the ears <S%H241><s%> of the deaf <S%H2795><s%> shall be unstopped <S%H6605><s%>.

Then shall the lame <S%H6455><s%> man leap <S%H1801><s%> as an hart <S%H354><s%>, and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the dumb <S%H483><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%>: for in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> shall waters <S%H4325><s%> break out <S%H1234><s%>, and streams <S%H5158><s%> in the desert <S%H6160><s%>.

And the parched ground <S%H8273><s%> shall become a pool <S%H98><s%>, and the thirsty land <S%H6774><s%> springs <S%H4002><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>: in the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of dragons <S%H8577><s%>, where each lay <S%H7258><s%>, shall be grass <S%H2682><s%> with reeds <S%H7070><s%> and rushes <S%H1573><s%>. grass: or, a court for reeds, etc

And an highway <S%H4547><s%> shall be there, and a way <S%H1870><s%>, and it shall be called <S%H7121><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of holiness <S%H6944><s%>; the unclean <S%H2931><s%> shall not pass over <S%H5674><s%> it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men <S%H1980><s%>, though fools <S%H191><s%>, shall not err <S%H8582><s%> therein. but: or, for he shall be with them

No lion <S%H738><s%> shall be there, nor any ravenous <S%H6530><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> thereon, it shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> there; but the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> shall walk <S%H1980><s%> there:

And the ransomed <S%H6299><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> to Zion <S%H6726><s%> with songs <S%H7440><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>: they shall obtain <S%H5381><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> and gladness <S%H8342><s%>, and sorrow <S%H3015><s%> and sighing <S%H585><s%> shall flee away <S%H5127><s%>.
